entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 50

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 70
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
